title: The Sweetest Seduction
description:
Alternate Cover Edition ASIN B00HP8J6XC
Never, ever, mix business with pleasure...
Lia Mantovani has created on of the hottest restaurants on Chicago's Magnificent Mile, but all that could disappear if she loses her lease with Kelly Properties. Having had her dreams ripped away from her before, she'll do everything in her power to keep her restaurant. He fate hangs on the whims of the frustratingly handsome Adam Kelly.Adam has spent years trying to convince world famous chef Amadeus Schlittler to open a restaurant in Chicago, but he wants the prime location held by Lia. Business has always come first... until sparks fly when Adam meets her. When things get hot outside the kitchen, though, they're both in danger of getting burned.
author: Crista McHugh
